attributes.action: Allow Fathers rights to see their children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The law in this county is biased in the family courts to allow mothers full responsibility for childrens rights to see their fathers after a divorce or seperation. The law should be changed to allow fathers access to see their child/ren as default in these circumstances.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FathersAccess/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
